Blog.post: urlLink Why do you cry? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla You are a.. GOTH! You're sick of the wannabe freaks ruining the scene and making your angst seem superficial. You thrive on the darker aspects of life, have an interest in classic literature and poetry, and probably get a kick out of Halloween. ("No.. that's not a costume, dammit!") urlLink The Subculture Label Quiz brought to you by urlLink Quizilla ((^^ha attitude maybe, but clothes.. ::sigh:: i'd say im a prep.. not by choice, u cant really find good "skater/goth" clothes that fit me or cheap enough for me^^)) You are Belle. Intellectual and self assured, you may catch a lot of flack for your disdain for being like every other girl out there. Love, to you, must be something very special to capture your attention, and you are likely to be strong willed and not easily dominated. All the same, family (and this includes close friends) mean the world to you-- you'd walk through fire to help the ones you love, and you have the strength and courage to weather any storm. urlLink The ULTIMATE 'Which Disney Princess Are You?' quiz brought to you by urlLink Quizilla urlLink urlLink What Name Should You Have? by urlLink Lauren -Perfect- You're the perfect girlfriend. Which means you're rare or that you cheated :P You're the kind of chick that can hang out with your boyfriend's friends and be silly. You don't care about presents or about going to fancy placed. Hell, just hang out. You're just happy being around your boyfriend. urlLink What Kind of Girlfriend Are You? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla My inner child is six years old! Look what I can do! I can walk, I can run, I can read! I like to do stuff, and there's a whole big world out there to do it in. Just so long as I can take my blankie and my Mommy and my three best friends with me, of course. urlLink How Old is Your Inner Child? brought to you by urlLink Quizilla

I hung out with Joslyn for a while... she's so confusing tho! First we were gonna go bowling, but it was closed, then we were gonna go to Ohio Skate, but it was closed.. then to a movie, but her mom wouldnt take us there, so we ended up just going to the mall.. it was fun I went with Joslyn and her friend (i think) Jessica.. they got cappachino and i got a hot chocolate, and jessica had to pee really bad, so she gets up and me and joslyn put 2 packets of sugar and 2 packets of sweet-and-low in her drink.. it was funny she didnt notice for a while.. then me and jos started randomly laughing in the car back to her house, and she kept slapping me so i'd slap her back, now i have a little bruise on my leg!! it was fun... i went back to her house and we went out back and her neighbor Josh, his brother, and a few other people were out there playing "baseball"... so we joined, i didnt want to play so i just sat there but they made me hit the ball.. so i barely hit it and just stood there, it was out anyway... i think josh likes me.. cuz he keeps telling me that i have to go over to joslyn's and hang out... and his brother was like "my brother likes you" and i didnt really hear him at first so i was like "what?" and he wouldnt answer me so yeah... idk josh is ok.. i dont think i'd ever like him tho.. I so cant wait for the finch concert July 30.. its gonna be soo much fun.. :) ha.. lots of fun... PIXIE STICKS haha andrea t knows!!! IT TICKLES lmao nvm

I got my ticket for the Finch concert!! I'm goin with Lucas so thats gonna be fun... I spent the weekend at my dad's.. it wasnt as bad as I thought it was going to be.. He grilled up steak and fish and corn.. yum... I GET MY BRACES OFF IN 3 DAYS!!!!!!!! yeah i was feeling a little idk, upset/sad/confused whatever earlier about seeing my grama who's going to die... and Lucas was helpin me thro it.. its just gonna be so hard to go see her... but im going to.. this time I'm going to really see her... I CANNOT WAIT A WHOLE MONTH TO SEE FINCH!!! ahh im so impatient... theres nothing to do.. no where to go, nobody to see. lol jk bout the last one.. blah blah blah im really fucking bored.. nobody's going to read this stupid blog anyway... altho i sayd that about my other one and like 10 people read it now.. so oh well AT LEAST I DONT KNOW THEM!! im so bored.. im gonna go... yea ::*crystal*::

But I can tell you I'm not too fond of blogger.. I have a blog of my own on another site... no comment on where... but i decided to make this blog thingy and let all my friends read it..ha.. that way they know a little bout whats going on and shit.. to all you random readers out there name:crystal age:14 sex:girl status:single (and hating it) grade:goin into 10th occupation: fucking dogs and eating gnome hats.. lmao no.. uhm none best friend: LUCAS! yeah ya'll suck so im gonna go.. enjoy!

god damn.. i havent written here in a long time.. nobody reads this thing tho... not like anybody cares.. yeah alot of shit is goin on... alot of mixed up feelings bout lots of stuff... i hate having 2 different blogs at the same time.. i think im gonna quit this one... yeah im gonna quit this one... nobody reads it so theres no point

i really think this blog is pointless but oh well yeah my 4th was fun exept for being a girl... damn... neway i spent the day lighting off fireworks and shit with my cousin chad.. i've missed him alot.. we got a loottt of fireworks and they were purty too.. lol... im going to be so bored this weekend.. thursday, friday, saturday, sunday i'll be home alone.. by myself.. doing nothing... who knows i might make plans.. oh well... my mom keeps startin shit with me, so i cried a little earlier.. she apologized but its just not the same... im a lil upset bout the 4th of july tho i went over to my uncle rob & aunt jessy's house and my aunt candy ((chads mom)) came over and they didnt really talk to me.. at all.. i think it has to do with the whole me not going and visiting my grama... the reason i went to their house the 4th was cuz she was supposed to be there.... they all just dont understand why i CANT go.. its just very very hard..... they do not understand me at all.... im gonna go before i cry ::*crystal*::
why'd u start why dont you stop why wont you listen WHY DONT YOU SEE THAT I CARE
